body_html: This was primarily due to the preprocessing and batch normalization that happens during training.To normalize an input at inference time please use 127.5 for RGB mean values and set the scale factor to 1/127.5 when calling opencv::dnn::blobFromImage. You might want to swap RB channels depending on how you read in the input during training.
body_text: This was primarily due to the preprocessing and batch normalization that happens during training.To normalize an input at inference time please use 127.5 for RGB mean values and set the scale factor to 1/127.5 when calling opencv::dnn::blobFromImage. You might want to swap RB channels depending on how you read in the input during training.
body: This was primarily due to the preprocessing and batch normalization that happens during training.To normalize an input at inference time please use 127.5 for RGB mean values and set the scale factor to 1/127.5 when calling opencv::dnn::blobFromImage. You might want to swap RB channels depending on how you read in the input during training.
